title: Spider-man: Into The Spider-verse | The Web of Identity
description:
I discuss the symbolism of Spider-Man into The Spider-Verse with Thomas Wijnaendts van Resandt of the Storytellers channel.  We look at how the movies shows us the manner in which we enter and participate in a common identity.

Storytellers: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCbphDfwSJmxk1Ny_3Oicrng

Support this channel: https://thesymbolicworld.com/support/

patreon: http://www.patreon.com/pageauvideos
subscribestar: http://www.subscribestar.com/jonathanpageau
paypal: http://www.paypal.me/JonathanPageau

website: http://www.thesymbolicworld.com
facebook: http://www.facebook.com/TheSymbolicWorld
twitter: http://www.twitter.com/pageaujonathan

My website designers,  Anomalist Design: https://www.anomalistdesign.com/

The music at the opening is Russian Eastern Overture, by Rimsky Korsakov.
